quiz.question: Which animal can hold its breath longer than a dolphin?
What is illegal to do with a goldfish in Switzerland?
options: Take it out of water for a photo

quiz.question: What unusual feature do octopus hearts have?
options: They stop beating when it rains

quiz.question: What happens if you cut a starfish into pieces?
options: It grows back into one starfish
Each piece becomes a new starfish
quiz.answer: Each piece becomes a new starfish

quiz.question: Which country once declared war on the ocean?
What strange effect can a wombat’s unique poop shape have?
options: It helps mark territory without rolling away
quiz.answer: It helps mark territory without rolling away

quiz.question: Which food item can last indefinitely if stored properly?
Why do kangaroos have difficulty walking backwards?
options: Their tail and body structure prevent it
quiz.answer: Their tail and body structure prevent it
